secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_l072:engine efficiency].
2. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_impossible_engine_question:calculate the efficiency] of an engine.
3. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_l072mi:efficiency] of an engine using the temperatures of the hot and cold reservoirs.
4. Define the [OBJ:expsec_l073:second law of thermodynamics]. Calculate engine efficiency using the second law of thermodynamics.
5. Determine the [OBJ:expsec_l075:direction of heat flow].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37379:Calculate] the efficiency of an engine.
